title: Strategic Decision-Making Competency Enhancement Program Using Business Simulation Games

context.prior_knowledge: Basic business administration theories (marketing, finance, human resources, etc.) and foundational statistical knowledge in mathematics
context.additional_context: Modular learning design considering accessibility and time efficiency based on smartphones.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze variables in the business environment with over 85% accuracy and make strategic decisions through simulation games.
Learners can improve resource allocation efficiency by 30% by applying mathematical modeling (e.g., demand forecasting, break-even analysis) in in-game scenarios.
Learners can enhance collaborative problem-solving skills by at least two levels on an assessment scale through team-based simulation activities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
